main event: On 7 August 66, a metallic appearing object, white in color, was observed moving slowly across the sky in Colorado Springs, Colorado.
interesting points: The object was visible for approximately 45 minutes,The object reflected sunlight and had a uniform, steady brightness,The observer concluded it was a satellite, specifically ECHO I,The object was visible as it emerged from and disappeared behind the horizon,The sighting was documented in a Project Blue Book report.
witness description: Details of the observer are not specified, but the report indicates a good reliability.
